sentence.Network_en: The relationships among P. arcturus, P. Krishna, P . maackii and P. syfanius were also closer.
sentence.Network_cn: 窄斑翠凤蝶(P. arcturus)、克里翠凤蝶(P. krishna) 、 绿带翠凤蝶(P. maackii) 和西番翠凤蝶(P. syfanius)的亲缘关系较近.

sentence.Network_en: This blue - white gem appears to the southwest ( lower left ) of Arcturus.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个蓝白宝石一样的星星出现在大角星的西南方向.

sentence.Network_en: With dark shies you will notice the reddish color of Arcturus.
sentence.Network_cn: 当夜幕降临时,你会注意到那颗淡红色的大角星.
